articles.author: Analysis by Ben Westcott, CNN
articles.title: Australia's Sex Discrimination Act will soon apply to politicians. Why didn't it before? - CNN
articles.description: A series of legal loopholes that prevent Australia's public servants -- including politicians and judges -- from being prosecuted for sexual harassment look like they are finally about to be closed following nearly 40 years on the statute books.
